titles.title: To make technical corrections to the National Parks and Recreation Act of 1978, and for other purposes.
To make technical corrections to the National Parks and Recreation Act of 1978, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Public Lands and Environmental Regulation.

bill.summary: Amends the National Parks and Recreation Act of 1978 to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to acquire an additional four acres of land for the Petersburg National Battlefield.
